sourcesContent:
Sample Parcel Weight: {{ parcel.sampleParcelWeight }}

  • Item ID: {{ item.index }} Item Name: {{ item.name }} Item Cost: {{ item.weight }} Item Weight: {{ item.cost }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Parcel } from '../interfaces/parcel.interface'; import { Item } from '../interfaces/item.interface' @Component({ selector: 'app-fetch-parcel-data', templateUrl: './fetchParcelData.component.html' }) export class FetchParcelDataComponent { public parcels: Parcel[] = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') private baseUrl: string) { this.fetchParcels(); } private fetchParcels(): void { this.http.get(this.baseUrl + 'parcel').subscribe( (parcels: Parcel[]) => { this.parcels = parcels; }, (error: any) => { console.error(error); } ); } }
